title: TPACK-Based Microlearning Design for Integrating Technology and Strengthening the Affective Domain in Music Education

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational music education theories and experience with technical tools
context.additional_context: A course where science education professionals learn innovative teaching methods integrating music education techniques and affective elements. Conducted in a mobile environment using personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Enhanced ability to analyze the interaction between music content and technological tools using the TPACK framework
Utilize digital creation tools (DAWs, AI composition software, etc.) with over 80% accuracy to design emotion-based music activities
Project-based development and presentation of technology-integrated music lesson designs that promote learner engagement
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
